data.name: AdorningEditors_Hyperlink_Text
data.comment: The text shown in the hyperlink that opens the blog post related to the sample.

data.name: CheckBoxInRecordSelectors_Button_ShowRecords
data.comment: The caption of the button that allows the user to see a separate listing of which records are checked and unchecked.

data.name: CheckBoxInRecordSelectors_MessageBox_Caption
data.comment: The caption of the MessageBox that shows which people are checked and unchecked.

data.name: CheckBoxInRecordSelectors_MessageBox_Checked
data.comment: The text displayed in the messagebox above the list of people whose records are checked

data.name: CheckBoxInRecordSelectors_MessageBox_Unchecked
data.comment: The text displayed in the messagebox above the list of people whose records are unchecked.

data.name: Commands_ConfigArea_Explanation
data.value: As you interact with the xamDataGrid below, available commands will be displayed as buttons. The availabilty of commands will turn on and off based upon your actions.
data.comment: The explanation of what this sample is showing the user.

data.name: Commands_ConfigArea_Explanation_FontFamily
data.comment: The font for the Explanation text

data.name: Commands_ConfigArea_Header
data.comment: The header of the area that displays all commands

data.name: Commands_ConfigArea_Header_FontFamily
data.comment: The font for the Header text

data.name: Commands_ConfigArea_Instructions
data.value: Interact with the xamDataGrid to see available commands change.
data.comment: The instructions above the datagrid that tell the user how to use the sample.

data.name: EventsArea_Header
data.comment: The header of the area that lists all events that have been raised by the grid.

data.name: ErrorMessage_InvalidValues
data.value: Invalid OrderEntry. One or more fields have invalid values.

data.name: Export_Export_ButtonText
data.comment: The text on the Export button on the Export tab

data.name: Export_Custom_Cell_Styling_ButtonText
data.value: Export Custom Cell Styling To Excel

data.name: Export_Export_Instructions1
data.value: Select the desired export options on the other tabs, then click the button below to export the contents of the grid.
data.comment: The instructions above the button on the Export tab.

data.name: Export_Export_Instructions2
data.value: After the export completes, Excel will be executed to display the Workbook. Also, the Events tab will contain a list of all the events that were fired by the DataPresenterExcelExporter during the export process.
data.comment: The instructions below the button on the Export tab.

data.name: Export_Export_TabHeader
data.comment: The text on the header of the first Tab

data.name: Export_Message_ExcelError_Caption
data.comment: MessageBox Caption used when the exported Workbook cannot be displayed in Excel

data.name: Export_Message_ExcelError_Text
data.value: An error was encountered while trying to run Excel to display the exported Workbook (do you have Excel installed)). System message: {0}
data.comment: MessageBox Text used when the exported Workbook cannot be displayed in Excel

data.name: Export_Message_ExcelExportError_Text
data.value: An error was encountered while trying to export to a file; it's possible the application does not have sufficient permissions. System message: {0}
data.comment: MessageBox Text used when there is an error generated during the exporting process.

data.name: Export_Message_ExportCompleted_Caption
data.comment: MessageBox Caption used when the Export process completes successfully

data.name: Export_Message_ExportCompleted_Text
data.value: The Export completed successfully. Excel will now be executed to display the exported Workbook.
data.comment: MessageBox Text used when the Export process completes successfully

data.name: Export_Message_FileError_Caption
data.value: Error Creating Unique File Name For Exported Workbook
data.comment: MessageBox Caption used when a unique filename cannot be created for the exported Workbook

data.name: Export_Message_FileError_Text
data.value: Could not create a unique name in the current working folder for the exported Workbook file!
data.comment: MessageBox Text used when a unique filename cannot be created for the exported Workbook

data.name: Export_Options_ChildRecordCollectionSpacing
data.comment: The text in the label that accompanies the first combo box on the options tab

data.name: Export_Options_ExcludeExpandedState
data.comment: The text for the CheckBox in row 2 column 1 on the options tab

data.name: Export_Options_ExcludeFieldLayoutSettings
data.comment: The text for the CheckBox in row 2 column 2 on the options tab

data.name: Export_Options_ExcludeFieldSettings
data.comment: The text for the CheckBox in row 3 column 1 on the options tab

data.name: Export_Options_ExcludeGroupBySettings
data.comment: The text for the CheckBox in row 3 column 2 on the options tab

data.name: Export_Options_ExcludeRecordFilters
data.comment: The text for the CheckBox in row 4 column 1 on the options tab

data.name: Export_Options_ExcludeRecordVisibility
data.comment: The text for the CheckBox in row 4 column 2 on the options tab

data.name: Export_Options_ExcludeSortOrder
data.comment: The text for the CheckBox in row 5 column 1 on the options tab

data.name: Export_Options_ExcludeSummaries
data.comment: The text for the CheckBox in row 5 column 2 on the options tab

data.name: Export_Options_FileLimitBehaviour
data.comment: The text in the label that accompanies the second combo box on the options tab

data.name: ExportToWord_Export_Custom_Cell_Styling_ButtonText1
data.value: Export Custom Cell Styling To Word

data.name: ExportToWord_Message_ExportCompleted_Text
data.value: The Export completed successfully. Word will now be executed to display the exported document.

data.name: ExportToWord_Message_FileError_Caption
data.value: Error Creating Unique File Name For Exported Word File.

data.name: ExportToWord_Message_FileError_Text
data.value: Could not create a unique name in the current working folder for the exported Word file!

data.name: ExportToWord_Message_WordError_Text
data.value: An error was encountered while trying to run Word to display the exported document (do you have Word installed)). System message: {0}

data.name: ExportToWord_Message_WordExportError_Text
data.value: An error was encountered while trying to export to a file; it's possible the application does not have sufficient permissions. System message: {0}

data.name: EnablingFieldChooserUI_Samp_ConfigArea_Header
data.comment: The header for the options area of the Enabling Field Chooser UI sample

data.name: EnablingFieldChooserUI_Samp_ConfigArea_HeaderPrefixAreaDisplayMode
data.comment: The text next to the HeaderPrefixAreaDisplayMode selector

data.name: EnablingFieldChooserUI_Samp_ConfigArea_HeaderPrefixAreaDisplayMode_Tooltip
data.value: FieldLayoutSettings' HeaderPrefixAreaDisplayMode property specifies whether to display a field chooser button in the area above the record selectors and left of the field labels.
data.comment: The tooltip displayed over the HeaderPrefixAreaDisplayMode selector

data.name: FieldChooserSettings_Samp_ConfigArea_DisplayHiddenFieldsOnly
data.comment: The contents of the DisplayHiddenFieldsOnly checkbox

data.name: FieldChooserSettings_Samp_ConfigArea_DisplayHiddenFieldsOnly_ToolTip
data.value: Controls whether all or just the fields that are currently not visible in the data presenter are displayed. It also affects the visibility of checkboxes next to the field labels.
data.comment: The tooltip displayed over the DisplayHiddenFieldsOnly checkbox.

data.name: FieldChooserSettings_Samp_ConfigArea_FieldDisplayOrder
data.comment: The text next to the FieldDisplayOrder selector

data.name: FieldChooserSettings_Samp_ConfigArea_FieldDisplayOrder_ToolTip
data.value: Controls the order of fields in the field chooser - whether alphabetical or in the same order as they are visible in the data presenter.
data.comment: The tooltip displayed over the FieldDisplayOrder selector

data.name: FieldChooserSettings_Samp_ConfigArea_FieldGroupSelectorVisibility
data.comment: The text next to the FieldGroupSelectorVisibility selector

data.name: FieldChooserSettings_Samp_ConfigArea_FieldGroupSelectorVisibility_ToolTip
data.value: Controls whether to display the FieldLayout selector in the field chooser.
data.comment: The tooltip displayed over the FieldGroupSelectorVisibility selector

data.name: ControllingFilterBehavior_Samp_ConfigArea_FilterAction
data.comment: The text next to the FilterAction selector

data.name: ControllingFilterBehavior_Samp_ConfigArea_FilterAction_Tooltip
data.value: FieldLayoutSettings' FilterAction property specifies what action to taken on a record that doesn't match filter conditions - whether to hide it, disable it or to take no action. None lets you change appearance of filtered out or in records by having style triggers based on record's IsFilteredOut property.
data.comment: The tooltip that's displayed over the FilterAction selector

data.name: ControllingFilterBehavior_Samp_ConfigArea_FilterStringComparisonType
data.comment: The text next to the FilterStringComparisonType selector

data.name: ControllingFilterBehavior_Samp_ConfigArea_FilterStringComparisonType_Tooltip
data.value: FieldSettings' FilterStringComparisonType property specifies whether to perform case sensitive comparisons.
data.comment: The tooltip displayed over the FilterStringComparisonType selector

data.name: ControllingFilterBehavior_Samp_ConfigArea_Header
data.comment: The header for the Controlling Filter Behavior sample

data.name: ControllingFilterBehavior_Samp_ConfigArea_RecordFilterScope
data.comment: The text next to the RecordFilterScope selector

data.name: ControllingFilterBehavior_Samp_ConfigArea_RecordFilterScope_Tooltip
data.value: FieldLayoutSettings' RecordFilterScope specifies whether filtering should be done on per record manager basis. Only affects child field layouts.
data.comment: The tooltip displayed over the RecordFilterScope selector

data.name: ControllingFilterBehavior_Samp_ConfigArea_RecordFiltersLogicalOperator
data.comment: The text next to the RecordFiltersLogicalOperator selector

data.name: ControllingFilterBehavior_Samp_ConfigArea_RecordFiltersLogicalOperator_Tooltip
data.value: FieldSettings' RecordFiltersLogicalOperator specifies whether filters across multiple fields are combined using logical 'Or' or 'And'.
data.comment: The tooltip displayed over the RecordFiltersLogicalOperator selector

data.name: ControllingFilterBehavior_Samp_ConfigArea_ReevaluateFiltersOnDataChange
data.value: Re-evaluate Filters on Record Data Change
data.comment: The content of the ReevaluateFiltersOnDataChange checkbox

data.name: ControllingFilterBehavior_Samp_ConfigArea_ReevaluateFiltersOnDataChange_Tooltip
data.value: FieldLayoutSettings' ReevaluateFiltersOnDataChange property specifies whether to re-evaluate filters on a data record when its data changes.
data.comment: The tooltip displayed over the ReevaluateFiltersOnDataChange checkbox

data.name: CustomFilterOperand_Even
data.comment: The display name of the custom filter operand that filters even integer values

data.name: CustomFilterOperand_EvenValues
data.comment: The description of the custom filter operand that filters even integer values

data.name: CustomFilterOperand_Odd
data.comment: The display name of the custom filter operand that filters odd integer values

data.name: CustomFilterOperand_OddValues
data.comment: The description of the custom filter operand that filters odd integer values

data.name: EnablingRecordFiltering_Samp_ConfigArea_AllowRecordFiltering
data.comment: The content of the AllowRecordFiltering checkbox

data.name: EnablingRecordFiltering_Samp_ConfigArea_AllowRecordFiltering_Tooltip
data.value: FieldSettings' AllowRecordFiltering property specifies whether the user is allowed to filter data of associated field or fields.
data.comment: The tooltip displayed over the AllowRecordFiltering checkbox

data.name: EnablingRecordFiltering_Samp_ConfigArea_FilterLabelIconDropDownType_Tooltip
data.value: FieldSettings' FilterLabelIconDropDownType property specifies the type of filtering used when FilterUIType is set to LabelIcons.

data.name: EnablingRecordFiltering_Samp_ConfigArea_FilterUIType
data.comment: The text next to the FilterUIType selector

data.name: EnablingRecordFiltering_Samp_ConfigArea_FilterUIType_Tooltip
data.value: FieldLayoutSettings' FilterUIType property specifies the type of filtering UI used - Filter record or filter icon in each field label.
data.comment: The tooltip displayed over the FilterUIType selector

data.name: EnablingRecordFiltering_Samp_ConfigArea_Header
data.comment: The header for the Enabling Record Filtering sample

data.name: External_Alphabetic_UI_Samp_ConfigArea_Header
data.comment: e

data.name: External_Alphabetic_UI_Samp_ConfigArea_Instructions
data.value: Click on one or more letters below and the data will be filtered to include only those records which contain a CustomerID that begins with that letter. Click a letter a second time to remove that filter.
data.comment: Instructions for the Alphabetic Filtering sample.

data.name: External_UI_Samp_ConfigArea_Field
data.comment: The text next to the Field combobox

data.name: External_UI_Samp_ConfigArea_Header
data.comment: The header for options area of Filtering External UI sample

data.name: FilterRecordUIOptions_Samp_ConfigArea_FilterClearButtonLocation
data.comment: The text next to the FilterClearButtonLocation selector

data.name: FilterRecordUIOptions_Samp_ConfigArea_FilterClearButtonLocation_Tooltip
data.value: FieldLayoutSettings' FilterClearButtonLocation property specifies whether to display filter clear button in filter cells and/or in the filter record's selector element.
data.comment: The tooltip displayed over the the FilterClearButtonLocation selector

data.name: FilterRecordUIOptions_Samp_ConfigArea_FilterClearButtonVisibility
data.comment: The text next to the FilterClearButtonVisibility selector

data.name: FilterRecordUIOptions_Samp_ConfigArea_FilterClearButtonVisibility_Tooltip
data.value: FieldSettings' FilterClearButtonVisibility property lets you control whether the filter clear button is visible on a per field basis.
data.comment: The tooltip displayed over the FilterClearButtonVisibility selector

data.name: FilterRecordUIOptions_Samp_ConfigArea_FilterEvaluationTrigger
data.comment: The text next to the FilterEvaluationTrigger selector

data.name: FilterRecordUIOptions_Samp_ConfigArea_FilterEvaluationTrigger_Tooltip
data.value: FieldSettings' FilterEvaluationTrigger property specifies when to apply the filteres entered in the filter cell.
data.comment: The tooltip displayed over the FilterEvaluationTrigger selector

data.name: FilterRecordUIOptions_Samp_ConfigArea_FilterOperandUIType
data.comment: The text next to the FilterOperandUIType selector

data.name: FilterRecordUIOptions_Samp_ConfigArea_FilterOperandUIType_Tooltip
data.value: FieldSettings' FilterOperandUIType property specifies the type of UI used for the filter cell where operand is entered - Text box, combo box, drop-down list, the editor field cells are using (UseFieldEditor) or whether its hidden (None) or disabled.
data.comment: The tooltip displayed over the FilterOperandUIType selector

data.name: FilterRecordUIOptions_Samp_ConfigArea_FilterOperatorDefaultValue
data.comment: The text next to the FilterOperatorDefaultValue selector

data.name: FilterRecordUIOptions_Samp_ConfigArea_FilterOperatorDefaultValue_Tooltip
data.value: FieldSettings' FilterOperatorDefaultValue property specifies the operator that's pre-selected in the filter cell.
data.comment: The tooltip displayed over the FilterOperatorDefaultValue selector

data.name: FilterRecordUIOptions_Samp_ConfigArea_FilterOperatorDropDownItems
data.comment: The text next to the FilterOperatorDropDownItems selector

data.name: FilterRecordUIOptions_Samp_ConfigArea_FilterOperatorDropDownItems_Tooltip
data.value: FieldSettings' FilterOperatorDropDownItems property specifies what operator options to provide in the operator drop-down in the filter cell.
data.comment: The tooltip displayed over the FilterOperatorDropDownItems selector

data.name: FilterRecordUIOptions_Samp_ConfigArea_FilterRecordLocation
data.comment: The text next to the FilterRecordLocation selector

data.name: FilterRecordUIOptions_Samp_ConfigArea_FilterRecordLocation_Tooltip
data.value: FieldLayoutSettings' FilterRecordLocation property specifies where the filter record is displayed - above data records (Top) or below data records (Bottom) and whether it's non-scrolling (TopFixed/BottomFixed).
data.comment: The tooltip displayed over the FilterRecordLocation selector

data.name: FilterRecordUIOptions_Samp_ConfigArea_Header
data.comment: The header for the Filter Record UI Options sample

data.name: HeaderPlacement_Samp_ConfigArea_Header
data.comment: The header for the Header Placement sample

data.name: HeaderPlacement_Samp_ConfigArea_HeaderPlacement
data.comment: The text next to the HeaderPlacement selector

data.name: HeaderPlacement_Samp_ConfigArea_HeaderPlacementInGroupBy
data.comment: The text next to the HeaderPlacementInGroupBy selector

data.name: HeaderPlacement_Samp_ConfigArea_HeaderPlacementInGroupBy_Tooltip
data.value: FieldLayoutSettings' HeaderPlacementInGroupBy property specifies whether the field header appears only at the top when records are grouped or with each island of data records.
data.comment: The tooltip displayed over the HeaderPlacementInGroupBy selector

data.name: HeaderPlacement_Samp_ConfigArea_HeaderPlacement_Tooltip
data.value: FieldLayoutSettings' HeaderPlacement property specifies whether the field header appears only at the top on a record island or after each record break.
data.comment: The tooltip displayed over the HeaderPlacement selector

data.name: EnablingDataErrors_Samp_ConfigArea_DataErrorDisplayMode
data.comment: The text next to the SupportDataErrorInfo selector

data.name: EnablingDataErrors_Samp_ConfigArea_DataErrorDisplayMode_Tooltip
data.value: FieldLayoutSettings' DataErrorDisplayMode property specifies how to display data errors.
data.comment: The tooltip displayed over the DataErrorDisplayMode selector

data.name: EnablingDataErrors_Samp_ConfigArea_Header
data.comment: The header for the Enabling IDataErrorInfo Support sample

data.name: EnablingDataErrors_Samp_ConfigArea_SupportDataErrorInfo
data.comment: The text next to the SupportDataErrorInfo selector

data.name: EnablingDataErrors_Samp_ConfigArea_SupportDataErrorInfo_Tooltip
data.value: FieldLayoutSettings' SupportDataErrorInfo property enables support for displaying data errors provided by IDataErrorInfo implementation of data items in the data source.
data.comment: The tooltip displayed over the SupportDataErrorInfo selector

data.name: AddRecord_ConfigArea_Setting_AllowUserToAddRecords
data.comment: The text of the CheckBox that controls if the user can add new records

data.name: AddRecord_ConfigArea_Setting_RecordLocation
data.comment: The header for the Record Location setting

data.name: AutoFitFields_ConfigArea_AutoFit_StarSizing
data.value: Use '*' sizing for CustomerID and CompanyName

data.name: AutoFitFields_ConfigArea_AutoFit_StarSizing_ToolTip
data.value: When checked, sets the Width of the CustomerID and CompanyName Fields to a FieldLength that represents 1* and 4* repectively.

data.name: AutoFitFields_ConfigArea_EnableFieldAutoFit
data.comment: The content of the CheckBox that controls if AutoFit is enabled

data.name: Clipboard_ConfigArea_AllowClipboardOperations_Tooltip
data.value: Sets the FieldLayoutSettings.AllowClipboardOperations property to determine which clipboard operations may be performed by the end-user.

data.name: Clipboard_ConfigArea_CopyFieldLabels_Tooltip
data.value: Used to determine if a row containing the field's Labels will be included in the formats put into the clipboard for cut and copy operations.

data.name: EnablingRightToLeft_ConfigArea_FlowDirection
data.comment: The text next to the FlowDirection selector

data.name: ExpandableFieldRecordDisplayModes_ConfigArea_RecordExpansionMode
data.comment: The text next to the Expansion Mode selector

data.name: ExpandableFieldRecordDisplayModes_ConfigArea_RecordHeaderDisplayMode
data.comment: The text next to the Header Display Mode selector

data.name: FieldLabelConfiguration_ConfigArea_LabelLocation
data.comment: The text next to the LabelLocation selector

data.name: FieldSorting_ConfigArea_LabelClickAction
data.comment: The text next to the LabelClickAction selector

data.name: FieldSorting_ConfigArea_SortComparisonType
data.comment: The text next to the SortComparisonType selector

data.name: FieldWidthAndHeight_ConfigArea_AutoSizeOptions
data.comment: The label for the list of checkable values on the right side

data.name: FieldWidthAndHeight_ConfigArea_AutoSizeScope
data.comment: The label for the combo box at the top of the right side

data.name: FieldWidthAndHeight_ConfigArea_ClearSetting
data.comment: The caption for the 3 buttons that let the user clear the value for the MinWidth, MaxWidth and Width settings

data.name: FieldWidthAndHeight_ConfigArea_ClearSetting_ToolTip
data.value: Sets this property to it's default value
data.comment: The ToolTip for the 3 ClearSetting buttons

data.name: FieldWidthAndHeight_ConfigArea_Field
data.comment: The label for the combo box that selects the Field

data.name: FieldWidthAndHeight_ConfigArea_Field_ToolTip
data.value: Select the Field whose Width properties you would like to change
data.comment: The ToolTip for the Width label and the Width combo box

data.name: FieldWidthAndHeight_ConfigArea_MaxWidth
data.comment: The label for the numeric editor that edits the value for the Field's MaxWidth

data.name: FieldWidthAndHeight_ConfigArea_MinWidth
data.comment: The label for the numeric editor that edits the value for the Field's MinWidth

data.name: FieldWidthAndHeight_ConfigArea_ReloadData
data.comment: The caption for the button at the bottom of the left side that lets the user reload the data in the grid.

data.name: FieldWidthAndHeight_ConfigArea_ReloadData_ToolTip
data.value: Click here to reload the data in the grid so you can see the effect of InitialAuto settings and changes to the AutoSize Scope setting.
data.comment: The tooltip for the ReloadData button.

data.name: FieldWidthAndHeight_ConfigArea_Width
data.comment: The label for the numeric editor that edits the value for the Field's Width

data.name: FixedFields_ConfigArea_AllowFixing_Tooltip
data.value: The 'AllowFixing' property of the FieldSettings class determines whether the FixedLocation of a field may be changed and if so to which edges it may be fixed.

data.name: FixedFields_ConfigArea_FixedFieldUIType_Tooltip
data.value: The 'FixedFieldUIType' property of the FieldLayoutSettings determines the type of ui that is displayed to allow the end user to change the FixedLocation of the fields. You can also change the fixed state by dragging a field in/out of a fixed area or on the fixed area splitter(s).

data.name: FixedRecords_ConfigArea_AllowRecordFixing_Tooltip
data.value: The AllowRecordFixing property determines whether/where the end user can fix the position of records to prevent them from scrolling out of view.

data.name: FixedRecords_ConfigArea_FixedRecordUIType_Tooltip
data.value: The FixedRecordUIType property determines whether the control displays a UI that lets the end-user fix records.

data.name: GroupByConfiguration_ConfigArea_FieldGroupByMode
data.comment: The text next to the FieldGroupByMode selector

data.name: GroupByConfiguration_ConfigArea_GroupByAreaLocation
data.comment: The text next to the GroupByAreaLocation selector

data.comment: The text next to the groupByAreaMode selector
